resolution.summary: Phase 3 fixes: (1) VCD tracker - added anchor validation, simplified source tracking logic, (2) VCD compiler - fixed uninitialized var handling with x/z/None support, removed debug prints, removed empty method, (3) VCD __eq__ - return NotImplemented instead of TypeError, (4) sim/hdl.py - fixed list.append bug, added type guard for func.id, (5) module.py - fixed wrong variable name bugs in add_instances, added duplicate port/parameter verification. 122 tests pass.
